amendment.description: To correct the authorization of appropriations for the Joint Engineering Data Management Information and Control System (JEDMICS) so as to be provided for in Navy RDT&E (PE 0603739N) instead of Navy procurement.

vote.text: Amendment SA 792 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 792 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6833-6834; text: CR S6833) To correct the authorization of appropriations for the Joint Engineering Data Management Information and Control System (JEDMICS) so as to be provided for in Navy RDT&E (PE 0603739N) instead of Navy procurement.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 792 proposed by Senator Warner.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 792 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
